Efficacy Charts:

Testing LLP.adl:
With CMSOD
./CLA.sh ./cms_opendata_ttbar.root CMSOD -i LLP.adl -e 10000
../CLA/CLA.exe ./cms_opendata_ttbar.root -inp CMSOD -BP 1 -EVT 10000 -V 5000 -ST 0
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =      0 % +-      0 %
With ATLASOD
./CLA.sh ./atla_opendata_had_ttbar.root ATLASOD -i LLP.adl -e 10000
../CLA/CLA.exe ./atla_opendata_had_ttbar.root -inp ATLASOD -BP 1 -EVT 10000 -V 5000 -ST 0
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =      0 % +-      0 %
With DELPHES
./CLA.sh ./delphes_events_ttbar.root DELPHES -i LLP.adl -e 10000
../CLA/CLA.exe ./delphes_events_ttbar.root -inp DELPHES -BP 1 -EVT 10000 -V 5000 -ST 0
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =      0 % +-      0 %
Testing ex1.adl:
With CMSOD
./CLA.sh ./cms_opendata_ttbar.root CMSOD -i ex1.adl -e 10000
../CLA/CLA.exe ./cms_opendata_ttbar.root -inp CMSOD -BP 2 -EVT 10000 -V 5000 -ST 0
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =   1.03 % +-  0.101 %
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =      0 % +-      0 %
With ATLASOD
./CLA.sh ./atla_opendata_had_ttbar.root ATLASOD -i ex1.adl -e 10000
../CLA/CLA.exe ./atla_opendata_had_ttbar.root -inp ATLASOD -BP 2 -EVT 10000 -V 5000 -ST 0
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =   3.71 % +-  0.189 %
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =      0 % +-      0 %
With DELPHES
./CLA.sh ./delphes_events_ttbar.root DELPHES -i ex1.adl -e 10000
../CLA/CLA.exe ./delphes_events_ttbar.root -inp DELPHES -BP 2 -EVT 10000 -V 5000 -ST 0
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =   25.5 % +-   1.38 %
					 --> Overall efficiency	 =      0 % +-      0 %
